tool_description: This French Conjugation API will provide you over 9000+ French verbs conjugations.
title: French Conjugaison

api_list.name: conjugate
api_list.description: This endpoint conjugates the french word.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://french-conjugaison.p.rapidapi.com/conjugate/{word}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "french-conjugaison.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
